text: @SkyNews @KayBurley It’s clear Boris and Trump have so many similarities. Using the war to gather public support in their analogy, both made enormous errors in coping with COVID19, hiding the truth, both have the worst death rates, Neither can be trusted! Veterans must dismayed and we won the war😳
